mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (prdNo, quantity, orderDate, buyerName, buyerHP, buyerEmail, shippingZipcode, shippingAddress1, shippingAddress2, bizId, totalPrice) VALUES (#{prdNo}, #{quantity}, #{orderDate}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerHP}, #{buyerEmail}, #{shippingZipcode}, #{shippingAddress1}, #{shippingAddress2}, #{bizId}, #{totalPrice})
